summary: Lessons from BrainLock by Jeffrey Schwartz

ai.aiDescription: Develop and stick to a routine
Get a job ,start volunteering, join a team

terms.term: Relabel - identify obsessions/compulsions for what they are
Reattribute - assign cause of thoughts/urges as OCD
Refocus - respond to thoughts/urges in constructive way
Revalue - conscious/non-automatic dismissal of obsessions/compulsions, resume normal/constructive life

takeaways.takeaway: Intro: I probably had OCPD as adolescent/young adult
Relabel: Process of taking notes/reflecting is a way to "contront" feelings consciously which is something I haven't done in a while
